detaileddescription.para: Get the root of the hypergraph

Get all hypernodes in the hypergraph. Ordered topologically. WARNING: Treat this as a const iterator.
Const iterator to hypernodes in hypergraph.

Get all hyperedges in the hypergraph. Ordered topologically. WARNING: Treat this as a const iterator.
Const iterator to edges in hypergraph .
Create a new node and begin adding edges.
Returns true if the node was created. Returns false if the node was removed (no children).
Complete the hypergraph.
Remove paths that do not reach the root.
Is this hypergraph the same as other.
